DTS:Executable.DTS:refId: Package\Calculo Punto J - Actualiza Tabla AMPS_PUNTOJ
DTS:Executable.DTS:ObjectName: Calculo Punto J - Actualiza Tabla AMPS_PUNTOJ
DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
--drop table #TMP_AMB --drop table #TMP_INT --drop table #TMP_PERSONAS --drop table #Personas18 --drop table #TMP_NOM --drop table #TMP_NOM_INT /* Calcula las personas AMPS con sus entidades en cada periodo */ SELECT S.id_periodo, S.id_persona, S.id_entidad INTO #Personas18 FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_COMP_GRUPO_ACTIVO S WHERE id_producto = 18 GROUP BY S.id_periodo, S.id_persona, S.id_entidad
/* Calcula consumos */
-- AMBULATORIO
SELECT C.id_periodo, C.id_persona, C.id_plan_producto, S.id_entidad, C.id_acreedor, SUM(imp_pret_amb_pag) as Importe, C.id_reintegro, C.id_provision, C.id_prestacion INTO #TMP_AMB FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_ORD_AMB_DET C JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRESTACION P on C.id_prestacion = P.id_prestacion JOIN #Personas18 S on C.id_persona = S.id_persona and C.id_periodo = S.id_periodo where C.id_producto = 18 and C.id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) and C.id_reintegro in ('F','R') AND C.id_provision in (1,2,3,4,6,8,9) GROUP BY C.id_periodo, C.id_persona, C.id_plan_producto, S.id_entidad, C.id_acreedor, C.id_reintegro, C.id_provision, C.id_prestacion
-- agrego nomenclador --INSERT INTO #TMP_AMB SELECT C.id_periodo, C.id_persona, C.id_plan_producto, S.id_entidad, C.id_acreedor, SUM(imp_pret_amb_pag) as Importe, C.id_reintegro, C.id_provision, C.id_prestacion INTO #TMP_NOM FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_ORD_AMB_DET C JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRESTACION P on C.id_prestacion = P.id_prestacion JOIN #Personas18 S on C.id_persona = S.id_persona and C.id_periodo = S.id_periodo where C.id_producto = 18 and C.id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) and C.id_reintegro in ('F','R') and SUBSTRING(C.id_prestacion,1,2) in ('NC', 'ND' ,'M1') GROUP BY C.id_periodo, C.id_persona, C.id_plan_producto, S.id_entidad, C.id_acreedor, C.id_reintegro, C.id_prestacion, C.id_provision
--UPDATE #TMP_AMB --SET id_prestacion = 0000 --where SUBSTRING(id_prestacion,1,2) not in ('NC', 'ND' ,'M1')
--Actualizo campos en tabla TMP_AMB con informacion que no haya sido cargada insert into #TMP_AMB select TN.id_periodo, TN.id_persona, TN.id_plan_producto, TN.id_entidad, TN.id_acreedor, TN.Importe, TN.id_reintegro, TN.id_provision, TN.id_prestacion from #TMP_NOM TN WHERE not exists (select TA.id_persona from #TMP_AMB TA where TA.id_persona = TN.id_persona)
-- INTERNACIONES
--Recupero detalles por provision SELECT C.id_periodo, C.id_persona, C.id_plan_producto, S.id_entidad, C.id_acreedor, SUM(imp_prest_int_pag) as Importe, C.id_reintegro, C.id_provision, C.id_prestacion INTO #TMP_INT FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_ORD_INT_DET C JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRESTACION P on C.id_prestacion = P.id_prestacion JOIN #Personas18 S on C.id_persona = S.id_persona and C.id_periodo = S.id_periodo where C.id_producto = 18 and C.id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) and C.id_reintegro in ('F','R') AND C.id_provision in (1,2,3,4,6,8,9) GROUP BY C.id_periodo, C.id_persona, C.id_plan_producto, S.id_entidad, C.id_acreedor, C.id_reintegro, C.id_provision, C.id_prestacion
--recupero detalles por nomenclador SELECT C.id_periodo, C.id_persona, C.id_plan_producto, S.id_entidad, C.id_acreedor, SUM(imp_prest_int_pag) as Importe, C.id_reintegro, C.id_provision, C.id_prestacion into #TMP_NOM_INT FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_ORD_INT_DET C JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRESTACION P on C.id_prestacion = P.id_prestacion JOIN #Personas18 S on C.id_persona = S.id_persona and C.id_periodo = S.id_periodo where C.id_producto = 18 and C.id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) and C.id_reintegro in ('F','R') and SUBSTRING(C.id_prestacion,1,2) in ('NC', 'ND' ,'M1') GROUP BY C.id_periodo, C.id_persona, C.id_plan_producto, S.id_entidad, C.id_acreedor, C.id_reintegro, C.id_provision, C.id_prestacion
--UPDATE #TMP_INT --SET id_prestacion = 0000 --where SUBSTRING(id_prestacion,1,2) not in ('NC', 'ND' ,'M1')
--Actualizo campos en tabla TMP_INT con informacion que no haya sido cargada insert into #TMP_INT select TN.id_periodo, TN.id_persona, TN.id_plan_producto, TN.id_entidad, TN.id_acreedor, TN.Importe, TN.id_reintegro, TN.id_provision, TN.id_prestacion from #TMP_NOM_INT TN WHERE not exists (select TA.id_persona from #TMP_AMB TA where TA.id_persona = TN.id_persona)
/* me fijo si existen personas en INT que no estan en AMB */ /* este control se hace por si se da el caso de que no existan combinaciones entre ambas tablas y no queden campos nulos */ select id_persona into #TMP_PERSONAS from #TMP_INT I where not exists (select id_persona from #TMP_AMB A where A.id_persona = I.id_persona)
if ((select COUNT(*) from #TMP_PERSONAS) > 0) begin /* Si existen casos inserto los de la tabla INT */
INSERT INTO AMPS_PUNTOJ (id_periodo, persona, plan_producto, entidad, acreedor, Importe, id_reintegro, id_provision, nomenclador) SELECT I.id_periodo, I.id_persona, I.id_plan_producto, I.id_entidad, I.id_acreedor, I.importe, I.id_reintegro, I.id_provision, SUBSTRING(I.id_prestacion,1,2) FROM #TMP_INT I --JOIN #TMP_AMB A on A.id_periodo = I.id_periodo and A.id_persona = I.id_persona --GROUP BY I.id_periodo, I.id_persona, I.id_plan_producto, I.de_prestacion
delete #TMP_INT where id_persona in (select id_persona from #TMP_PERSONAS) end
/* Actualiza AMPS_PUNTOJ */
--DELETE AMPS_PUNTOJ INSERT INTO AMPS_PUNTOJ (id_periodo, persona, plan_producto, entidad, acreedor, Importe, id_reintegro, id_provision, nomenclador) SELECT A.id_periodo, A.id_persona, A.id_plan_producto, A.id_entidad, A.id_acreedor, SUM(IsNull(A.Importe,0)+IsNull(I.Importe,0)) AS Importe, A.id_reintegro, A.id_provision, SUBSTRING(A.id_prestacion,1,2) FROM #TMP_AMB A FULL OUTER JOIN #TMP_INT I on A.id_periodo = I.id_periodo and A.id_persona = I.id_persona GROUP BY A.id_periodo, A.id_persona, A.id_plan_producto, A.id_entidad, A.id_acreedor, A.id_reintegro, A.id_provision, A.id_prestacion
/* Actualiza descripcion de Prestacion */ update AMPS_PUNTOJ set desc_provision = P.de_provision from AMPS_PUNTOJ J join DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PROVISION P on J.id_provision = P.id_provision
update AMPS_PUNTOJ set desc_provision = 'GESTION DESENTRALIZADA' where nomenclador = 'ND'
update AMPS_PUNTOJ set desc_provision = 'CAPITA' where nomenclador = 'NC'
update AMPS_PUNTOJ set desc_provision = 'MEDICAMENTOS NO ENCONTRADOS' where nomenclador = 'M1'
/* Actualiza descripcion de reintegro */ update AMPS_PUNTOJ set desc_reintegro = R.de_reintegro from AMPS_PUNTOJ J join DW_SALUD.dbo.D_REINTEGRO R on J.id_reintegro = R.id_reintegro
--select * from AMPS_PUNTOJ where nomenclador = 'M1'
--SELECT * FROM #TMP_AMB WHERE SUBSTRING(id_prestacion,1,2) in ('NC', 'ND' ,'M1') --SELECT * FROM AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize
